Your work creates value. Youll develop innovative solutions and build relationships with teammates and clients while accessing global capabilities to scale your ideas, embrace new opportunities, and benefit from expansive industry and technology expertise.  

Youll shape your career by joining a company built to grow and last. Youll be supported by leaders who care about your health and well-being and provide you with opportunities to deepen your skills and broaden your horizons.  

At CGI, we recognize the richness that diversity brings. We strive to create a work culture where all belong and collaborate with clients in building more inclusive communities. As an equal-opportunity employer, we want to empower all our members to succeed and grow. If you require an accommodation at any point during the recruitment process, please let us know. We will be happy to assist.  

Come join our team one of the largest IT and business consulting services firms in the world.
**What you can expect from us:**
--------------------------------


**Lt oss som gare omvandla verklig insikt till handling tillsammans.**  

  

Livet p CGI bygger p gande, lagarbete, respekt och tillhrighet. Tillsammans med oss kommer du att kunna n din fulla potential.  

  

Du r inbjuden att ta gandeskap redan frn frsta dagen i vrt arbete med att frverkliga vr drm om att skapa en arbetsmilj dr vi trivs med att arbeta tillsammans och bidrar till framgngen fr vrt fretag. Det r drfr vi kallar oss CGI Partners snarare n anstllda. Vi drar nytta av vr kollektiva framgng och tillsammans fr vi mjlighet att aktivt forma vr fretagsstrategi och inriktning.  

  

Ditt arbete skapar vrde. Du kommer att vara med att utveckla innovativa lsningar och bygga relationer med medarbetare och kunder samtidigt som du fr tillgng till globala mjligheter att skala upp dina ider, omfamna nya mjligheter och dra nytta av gedigen bransch- och teknikexpertis.  

  

Du kommer att forma din karrir tillsammans med ett fretag som r byggt fr att vxa och best. Du fr std av ledare som bryr sig om din hlsa och ditt vlbefinnande och ger dig mjligheter att frdjupa dina kunskaper och vidga dina vyer.
  

  

Bli en del en av vrldens strsta leverantrer av IT- och affrskonsulttjnster.

title: Business Intelligence Specialist
description:
Do you have the skills to transform innovative ideas into real-world BI solutions?
  
  

Region Europe North/East is looking for a driven Business Intelligence Specialist to elevate our BI skills to the next level.
  
  

The Region employs 570 professionals across 16 subsidiaries in 10 countries—and one thing's for sure: we won't run out of data to analyse! With a tight cooperation with our global data heroes, you will truly have a chance to make a dent with your presence. And from time to time be a part of our global projects.
  
  

In this role, you'll be the go-to person when people need answers to their problems. This job is your golden opportunity to not only develop your technical skills working with QlikSense & Power BI, but also to collaborate with business experts in Region Europe North/East. You will be working on a diverse set of exciting projects that are guaranteed to push your business & BI skills to the next level. Your skill and interest of data will probably lead you into future projects in AI and automation within our group.
  
  

But how do you know if our culture is a fit for you?
  
  

Our Values
  
At Bufab we strive to be leaders in what we do.
  
  

This means we hold ourselves to high standards with our core values guiding how we interact with our peers and approach our work. The right person for this role will embody each of these values, personally subscribe to them, and understand why each is critical to deliver great results.
  
  

Growth mindset
  
We call ourselves Solutionists.
  
  

This means you're someone who likes to solve hard problems and frame challenges as growth opportunities instead of problems. You will be expected to showcase this growth mindset by constantly learning and looking for new ways to improve your professional skillset. You will deliberately seek challenging projects that stretch your comfort zone for the sake of self-development.
  
  

Clear communication
  
Clarity is the greatest driver of speed.
  
  

And speed is something we value, with deep entrepreneurial roots. To achieve clarity, clear communication is of paramount importance, not only towards our internal customers and external stakeholders but also inside our own team. This means you should have the courage to communicate with integrity and respect, even when facing difficult situations.
  
  

Helping others
  
Lastly, at its core, business intelligence is a support function to the business.
  
  

That is why helping others should be a fundamental part of who you are. You find fulfilment not only in mastering technical skills but also in seeing how those skills directly contribute to improving the lives and outcomes of those you support, making you an invaluable asset to the organization.
  
  

Results
  
  

* Understand business needs & translate it into actionable
* BI solutions Build & maintain advanced data models using best practices
* Develop complex calculations with performant code
* Design effective UI/UX following standard guideline
* Provide training to the organization


Requirements
  
  

* A proven track record in business intelligence development
* Self-sufficient and skilled in managing time effectively
* Organized & used to working in structured way
* Excellent communicator
* Good communication skills in both Swedish and English
* Growth mindset


Location
  
You will preferably work in one of our offices in Värnamo or Gothenburg.
  
  

Occasional travel is a part of the role.
  
  

Application
  
Is this the next chapter in your career story? If so, we are looking forward to your application.
  
  

Applications will be read on an ongoing basis, latest day to apply is on the 14th of March.
  
  

For us, it is important that all skills in the labour market are utilized. We welcome all applicants and strive for diversity.
  
  

We want to be the best place to work for curious, committed and motivated employees.
  
  

If you have any questions about the open position, please contact Helena Häger, Finance & Digital Transformation manager for Region North & East, helena.hager@bufab.com.
  
  

Today, the Bufab group has around 1800 employees and 50+ wholly owned operational subsidiaries in 28 countries. Our employees are what makes our success. We offer freedom, responsibility, and development opportunities in an international environment and in a company characterized by entrepreneurs. At the same time, we maintain a lot of the company's family feeling that we have had since we were founded in 1977. The Bufab share is listed on Nasdaq Stockholm under the short name "BUFAB". Read more about us at www.bufab.com.

title: LIA inom Teknikinformation
description:
Infotiv erbjuder konsulter, lösningar och verktyg som hjälper våra kunder att med framgång utveckla och digitalisera sina produkter och produktinformation.
  
  

Våra åtaganden kännetecknas av kundfokus, personligt bemötande, kvalitetsfokus och långsiktighet. Vi är nyfikna och prövar gärna nya lösningar tillsammans med våra kunder.
  
  

Vision, mission och kultur
  
  

Infotivs Vision är att skapa En värld med fler innovativa människor som skapar en hållbar teknik för framtiden.
  
  

För att ligga i teknikens framkant utvecklar vi kompetens, koncept, metoder och verktyg vilket bidrar till att människor och teknik kan utvecklas snabbare. Det kallar vi Instant Innovation och är vår mission.
  
  

Vår kultur och signum är ”Varmt hjärta och skarp hjärna” och är det som kännetecknar oss och vårt varumärke. Vi vågar prova nya saker. Vi söker det lustfyllda, eftersom det skapar energi.
  
  

Som anställd hos oss på Infotiv är du del av en gemenskap som präglas av öppenhet och god sammanhållning där vi stöttar och hjälper varandra. Vi värdesätter våra medarbetare och strävar alltid efter att erbjuda en god och attraktiv arbetsmiljö där du som medarbetare trivs och utvecklas tillsammans med dina kollegor.
  
  

Vi är anslutna till Almega och erbjuder kollektivavtal som ger dig som medarbetare trygghet och säkerhet i anställningen. Utöver detta erbjuder vi goda förmåner så som friskvårdsbidrag, företagshälsovård och tjänstepension för att du ska ha det bra även i senare skeden i livet. I kombination med våra stora ramavtal och goda kundrelationer gör det att vi kan ha en långsiktig strategi, där vi tillsammans kan utveckla och bygga ditt CV genom rätt uppdragsbyten och kompetensutveckling. Hos oss kan du både testa nya saker och utvecklas samtidigt som du kan känna dig trygg i din anställning.
  
  

Våra ledord "varmt hjärta och skarp hjärna" är värderingar som genomsyrar hela företaget, vårt arbetssätt, vårt ledarskap och vår arbetsmiljö. Det varma hjärtat står för empati, tillit och samarbete, och det är viktigt för oss att du som medarbetare känner dig uppskattad, sedd och lyssnad på. Den skapa hjärnan står för kompetens och innovation, och vi värdesätter varje individs förmågor och kompetens genom att uppmuntra nytänkande, kreativitet och initiativtagande. Tillsammans är vi Infotiv.
  
  

Är du nyfiken på Infotiv och vill vara en del av vår spännande resa? Vi söker två engagerade LIA-praktikanter inom teknikinformation som kan bidra till vår fortsatta framgång och lära sig mer om branschen.
  
  

På Infotiv värdesätter vi kundfokus, personligt bemötande, kvalitet och långsiktighet. Vi erbjuder konsulter, lösningar och verktyg som hjälper våra kunder att med framgång utveckla och digitalisera sina produkter och produktinformation.
  
  

Om du brinner för teknik och innovation, och vill arbeta i en dynamisk miljö där nyfikenhet och kreativitet uppmuntras, så vill vi gärna höra från dig!
  
  

**Vad vi erbjuder:**  

Svenska Sjöräddningssällskapet (SSRS) är en ideell organisation med målet att ingen skall omkomma till sjöss.
  
  

I syfte att hjälpa volontärer med att identifiera vilka resurser som krävs, har SSRS i samarbete med industrin och akademin utvecklat ett drönarsystem som skall tillhandahålla värdefull data från olycksplatsen. Syftet är att personalen ska få information om vilka räddningsredskap och andra resurser som behövs innan de lämnar land, för att bidra med säkrare och mer effektiv sjöräddning.
  
  

När drönaren inte används förvaras den i uppskjutningsenheten, där den även har möjligt att laddas. Infotiv är huvudpartnern i utvecklingen av uppskjutningsenheten, med fokus på hårdvara, elektronik, mjukvara och användargränssnittet för underhållet av startsekvensen för drönaren.
  
  

Infotiv har i flera omgångar både haft exjobbare och praktikanter som har arbetat med Launchern och nu tar vi ytterligare ett steg genom att koppla ihop utvecklingen med dokumentationen.
  
  

**I ett tätt samarbete kommer ni att:**  

* Utvärdera den befintliga set up-en för dokumentationen som finns i GIT
* Bidra med lösningsförslag som kan implementeras i samtliga projekt
* Sätta strukturen för en manual till vår Launcher
* Sätta strukturen för en manual till montering av drönaren


**På vårt kontor kan vi erbjuda:**  

* En stimulerande arbetsmiljö med spännande utmaningar inom teknikinformation
* Praktisk erfarenhet av att skapa och hantera teknisk dokumentation
* Handledning och stöd från erfarna teknikinformatörer
* En varm och inkluderande företagskultur


**Vem du är:**  

* En driven och engagerad student med passion för teknik och kommunikation
* Har ett intresse för att förklara komplexa tekniska koncept på ett lättförståeligt sätt
* Flexibel och anpassningsbar, med förmåga att snabbt sätta dig in i nya tekniska sammanhang
* En lagspelare som trivs i en samarbetsinriktad miljö
* Nyfiken och alltid redo att lära dig nya saker inom teknikinformation


**Bakgrund och erfarenheter:**  

* Studerar till teknikinformatör eller liknande utbildning
* Grundläggande kunskaper i teknisk dokumentation och informationsdesign
* Förståelse för olika dokumentationsverktyg och format (t.ex. XML, DITA, Markdown)
* Goda språkkunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift
* Grundläggande förståelse för användarupplevelse (UX) och informationsarkitektur


Vilka är vi?
  
  

Våra ledord "varmt hjärta och skarp hjärna" är värderingar som genomsyrar hela företaget, vårt arbetssätt, vårt ledarskap och vår arbetsmiljö. Det varma hjärtat står för empati, tillit och samarbete, och det är viktigt för oss att du som medarbetare känner dig uppskattad, sedd och lyssnad på. Den skapa hjärnan står för kompetens och innovation, och vi värdesätter varje individs förmågor och kompetens genom att uppmuntra nytänkande, kreativitet och initiativtagande. Tillsammans är vi Infotiv.
  
  

Ansökan
  
  

Om du är intresserad av att bli en av våra praktikanter på Infotiv så tycker vi att du ska ansöka till oss. Vi önskar höra mer om:
  
  

* Dina erfarenheter; vad du har gjort tidigare i livet och vad du önskar göra framöver
* Vem du är utanför arbetet
* Eventuellt några rader om vad som gör dig till just den du är


Låter detta intressant, så tveka inte att ansöka redan idag. Vi genomför intervjuer löpande och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum. Vi hoppas att du vill vara med och växa med oss! Har du frågor eller funderingar, tveka inte att kontakta konsultchef Elisabeth Larsen på 073-351 39 55 eller rekryteringsansvarig Staffan Bernheim på 070-964 72 02.

title: UX Designer
description:
*Sebratec is a Software and Engineering company specializing in services for the tech industry. Our mission is to transform companies through software and embedded systems solutions, supporting customers with consultancy in the development of their products, as well as training for teams and individuals interested in technology.*

  

We are seeking a dynamic and innovative UX Designer to join our team. This unique role will focus on designing intuitive educational solutions to enhance AI competencies among employees and transforming the Sales and Operations Planning (S&OP) process to improve supply chain transparency and efficiency. Two very different initiatives where AI stands in the center.

  

#### **Key Responsibilities**

**AI Learning Solutions:**

* Design interfaces and information architecture for AI learning solutions, including platforms, pathways, and chatbots.
* Create interactive learning journeys tailored to various personas and levels of expertise.
* Develop personalized learning paths based on UX research insights to facilitate effective AI learning.
* Co-develop interactive AI-driven learning assistants, such as AI-powered chatbots, to support employee training.
* Create prototypes for educational platforms and AI learning tools, ensuring a user-centered design approach.
* Collaborate with UX Researchers to test and iteratively improve designs based on user feedback.
* Partner with stakeholders and Subject Matter Experts (SMEs) to ensure an optimal learning experience.
* Work closely with Product and Engineering teams to implement designs following UX best practices.

**S&OP Process Transformation:**

* Optimize global capacity allocation to effectively meet customer and market demands.
* Improve demand forecasting and product mix strategies to enhance operational efficiency.
* Enhance risk assessment processes within the supply chain to mitigate potential disruptions.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment between supply chain strategies and educational initiatives.

#### **Key Requirements:**

* Minimum 3 years as a UX Designer, preferably in educational technology or learning experience platforms.
* Experience designing interactive learning platforms or AI-powered educational tools.
* Strong knowledge of UX processes, including research, prototyping, testing, and iterative improvements.
* Proficiency in UX/UI tools like Figma, Adobe XD, and Sketch.
* Basic knowledge of AI and ML technologies and their impact on UX.
* Experience working with Product and Development teams.
* Understanding of Design Systems and Accessibility Standards (WCAG).
* Familiarity with supply chain processes and S&OP methodologies.

**Nice-to-Have (Preferred Skills):**

* Experience designing AI-driven tools like AI chatbots for learning
* Familiarity with Learning Experience Design (LXD) and instructional design principles
* Ability to use UX analytics data to iteratively improve solutions
* Knowledge of demand forecasting techniques and risk assessment in supply chain management.

title: Digital Designer
description:
**About Maurten**


We exist primarily for people who see themselves as athletes. People who are not satisfied with simply joining, finishing, and then going home. People who see training and competing as a way of life and always aim for the best results possible — they want to progress themselves. These are the people who will benefit most from using Maurten products. They push themselves to achieve their best and we push ourselves to give them our best.


Back in 2015, we found a way to make sports fuels easier to tolerate: by encapsulating carbohydrates in hydrogels. This method was so successful that today most of the world's best marathoners, cyclists, and triathletes are fueling their training sessions and competitions with our technology.


As Maurten grows rapidly, we need to grow our team with colleagues that share our passion for sports. The company looks for people who can grow, think, create, and dream. Join us in upholding a culture of integrity, teamwork, and community.

**About the position**  

  



The Digital Designer is responsible for crafting, managing, and executing visually compelling and high-performing digital design experiences across multiple platforms — including web, social media, email campaigns, digital retail, and digital advertisements.

  

The Digital Designer ensures that all design projects align with Maurten’s brand guidelines and marketing goals. This role reports to the Head of Marketing Design.

**Job responsibilities**


* Collaborate with creative, content, and e-commerce teams to design high-quality digital assets for web, social media, ads, email campaigns, and other online channels.
* Develop user-centered wireframes, prototypes, and UI designs for websites and mobile applications, ensuring a seamless user experience (UX).
* Edit and enhance digital media, including images, videos, and animations, using tools like Figma and Adobe Creative Suite.
* Maintain brand consistency across all digital assets while optimizing designs for performance, engagement, and fast load times.
* Conduct user research, stay updated on design trends, and manage external agencies and digital asset libraries to enhance efficiency and creativity.

**This is who you are:**


Creativity thrives on questioning the status quo, pushing boundaries, and generating fresh ideas. A collaborative, team-first mindset is key to turning those ideas into something meaningful, with openness and authenticity at the core. No ego, just a shared drive to create and improve together.  

  

  



* 3+ years of proven experience in digital design with a strong portfolio showcasing web, mobile, and social media projects.
* Proficiency in design software such as Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, XD, Figma, Sketch, and After Effects.
* Strong understanding of UI/UX principles and best practices for digital interfaces.
* Experience working with web developers to ensure accurate design implementation
* Ability to manage multiple projects, meet deadlines, and collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.


This position is based at our HQ in Gothenburg, Sweden.

**Is this you?**


If you are interested in joining the Maurten team, please do not hesitate to submit your application - **in English**. We apply a continuous selection process, and the job post will be open until the position is filled. We value your individual qualities as much as your professional expertise. Join us in building something extraordinary.


**Please upload your CV and share your portfolio when applying for this position.**

title: Head of Product Management till Bjorn Lunden
description:
*Har du erfarenhet som ledare inom Tech och Product management? Vill du ta nästa steg i karriären i en internationell roll hos ett företag som värnar om din personliga utveckling och där vi tillsammans skapar en öppen och inkluderande kultur?*

**Arbetsbeskrivning**


Som **Head of Product Management** har du det övergripande ansvaret för att definiera och genomföra företagets produktstrategi och tekniska innovation. Du blir en nyckelspelare i att utveckla vår produktportfölj, förbättra kundupplevelsen och maximera affärsresultat genom datadrivet beslutsfattande och strategiskt ledarskap.


Du samarbetar nära andra ledare för att säkerställa att produktutvecklingen är både skalbar och effektiv. Rollen kräver en balans mellan visionärt ledarskap, operativt genomförande och personalansvar. Du blir en brobyggare mellan teknik, affärsverksamhet och kundbehov – och en drivande kraft i att ta våra produkter till nästa nivå.


I denna roll kommer du att utgå från något av våra kontor i Stockholm eller Hudiksvall/Näsviken och vår **Product Management-avdelning** är verksam i tre länder och består av Product Owners, Product Managers och UX/UI-designers. Du arbetar tätt tillsammans med andra **"Heads of" inom Development** samt andra affärsområden för att säkerställa att våra produkter möter marknadens behov och driver affären framåt. Du rapporterar till **CTO/CPTO för Bjorn Lunden Group**.

**Vi tror att du har:**

  

* Erfarenhet av **Product Management, UX/UI och agila metoder**.
* En **ledarskapsroll inom mjukvara/SaaS** i bagaget.
* Stark förståelse för **affärsstrategi, P&L Management och marknadsdriven produktutveckling**.
* Erfarenhet av **datadrivet beslutsfattande, analys och användarbehovsanalys**.

**Det är meriterande om du:**

* Har **internationell erfarenhet**.
* Är van att **leda mångsidiga team**.
* Har **certifieringar inom produktledning och agila ramverk**.

**Vårt erbjudande**


Hos oss får du möjlighet att bli en del av en engagerad och stöttande utvecklingsavdelning, uppdelad i mindre team spridda över Sverige, Danmark och Nederländerna. Vi tror starkt på tvärfunktionellt samarbete som inte bara bidrar till din personliga och professionella utveckling, utan också gör vardagen varierad och inspirerande.

  

Vi erbjuder ett hybrid arbetssätt, där du har flexibiliteten att arbeta på distans men också möjlighet att träffa kollegor på något av våra kontor 2–3 dagar i veckan. Våra kontor finns i Näsviken, Ljusdal, Hudiksvall, Göteborg och Stockholm, och dina närmaste kollegor är främst baserade i Hälsingland och Göteborg. Resor förekommer i denna tjänst, men vi ser det som ett tillfälle att knyta starkare band med teamet.


Vi ser fram emot att välkomna dig till vårt öppna och innovativa team, där vi tillsammans formar framtidens lösningar!

**Om Bjorn Lunden**  

Vi på Bjorn Lunden är affärsplattformen som gör vardagen enklare för små och medelstora företag. Vi har en enkel övertygelse: varje företag förtjänar tillväxtmöjligheter. Vi är här för att göra det möjligt .


Vi är på en riktigt spännande resa. Vi siktar högt och vår vision är att bli en av de ledande leverantörerna av programlösningar för redovisning och ekonomi i nordvästra Europa. Med stolta rötter i Hälsingland, närmare bestämt i den lilla orten Näsviken, har vi på kort tid växt från ett nationellt företag till en internationell koncern. Idag har vi verksamhet i både Sverige, Nederländerna och Danmark.  

  

Hos oss får du vara med och skapa en bättre vardag för företagare, samtidigt som du blir en del av en organisation som växer, utmanar och utvecklas. Välkommen till Bjorn Lunden!

 **Frågor och kontakt**  

I denna rekrytering samarbetar Bjorn Lunden med Amendo Tech. Vid frågor om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta Johanna Hallenberg på johanna.hallenberg@amendotech.se. Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

 **Om Amendo Tech**  

Amendo Tech är det självklara konsult- och rekryteringsföretaget inom tech, IT och digital utveckling.


Amendo Tech är en del av Amendo Group som har arbetat med kompetensförsörjning sedan 2001. I koncernen ingår även Lagotto Executive Search & Interim som är specialiserade på executive search och interima tillsättningar av ledare och specialister, samt Amendo Bemanning och Rekrytering som erbjuder rekryterings- och konsultlösningar inom ekonomi, bank, finans, försäkring, HR och kommunikation.


Följ gärna Amendo Tech på Linkedin.


#LI-JH1  

#IT

title: Designer - Stockholm
description:
**About Us**
 At Twigeo, we’re on a mission to craft innovative and impactful digital marketing campaigns. With a growth-driven mindset, we thrive at the intersection of creativity and strategy, delivering measurable results while pushing the boundaries of what’s possible.
   

  

**The Opportunity**
 As a Designer at Twigeo, you will contribute to multiple brands from a creative and visual design perspective, ensuring impact for target audiences. This involves executing digital marketing campaigns, maintaining client relationships, and actively contributing to the evolution of our creative practice. You'll also be a key contributor to our global creative team, pushing the boundaries of craft and technology.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
**Design and execution**
* Develop impactful marketing assets for multiple media channels (images, banners, videos, paid/organic social).
* Present ideas and creatives with dynamic storytelling


**Cross-collaboration**
* Collaborate with the other creatives and functions to align visuals with messaging and strategy.


**Foster client relationships**
* Maintain client expectations and communication with brand/marketing teams through presentations and regular updates.
* Lead creative meetings + brainstorms to build/maintain trust.


**Innovation**
* Stay ahead of best practices and trends while continuously expanding your knowledge of emerging tools and techniques to enhance design quality and efficiency.
* A “yes, and” mindset that contributes to a continuous feedback culture.


 If this sounds like you, we’d love to hear from you!
   

  

**What You’ll Bring**
* 3+ years of experience as a digital graphic or motion designer.
* Knowledge of motion design principles.
* Proficiency in Figma and Adobe Suite (After Effects).
* Awareness of AI tools like Midjourney and ChatGPT/Claude.
* Experience in an agency, start up, or similar environments.
* Strong communication skills and experience working cross functionally
* Familiarity with digital marketing KPIs, industry best practices and all major marketing channels (Meta, Google, Apple, Snapchat, Twitter.)


**Why Join Twigeo?**
* Collaborate with a creative team to bring ideas to life.
* Be a part of a growth agency on a journey to expand its creative offering
* Work with a dynamic team passionate about innovation and measurable impact.
* Collaborate on campaigns for diverse clients, combining strategy and creativity.


**What We Offer**
* Generous Time Off: Enjoy 30 paid vacation days to recharge
* Wellness contribution: 5000 sek/yearly to support your well-being
* Flexible Work Environment: Thrive in a hybrid working model that balances collaboration and flexibility. Office days are Tuesdays-Thursdays
* Growth Opportunities: Advance your career in a dynamic environment that encourages skill development and innovation
* Recognition and Impact: Join a workplace where your ideas are valued, your voice is heard, and your contributions make a difference


**Ready to take the next step in your career?** 
 Join us in shaping the future of marketing.

title: UX Copywriter
company_industry: Financial Services and Technology, Information and Media
description:
**Stockholm**
 MAJORITY is a groundbreaking mobile banking service built for migrants, by migrants. Global migration is a 21st-century reality, whether people are following their dreams, love, or new experiences. Our purpose at MAJORITY is to empower the ambitious, the brave, and the talented and help them achieve their dreams. We believe that everyone deserves the same opportunity to succeed. Thus, our mission is to provide migrants the tools they need to thrive in their new country. Come join us!
   

  

 We are MAJORITY, people without borders from 20+ countries around the world. The most important thing for us is working with ambitious people who are passionate about making a difference and keen to help us achieve our mission. Does that sound like you? Then we’d love to hear from you.
   

  

 We are looking for a passionate UX Copywriter and Localization Manager to join MAJORITY’s exciting journey to build and roll out the premiere banking and multi-service solution for migrants and internationals. You will be deeply embedded in the product team, working closely alongside Product Managers, Designers, and Marketing on UX copy and product communication for our cutting-edge fintech app. You will also be in charge of spearheading our localization efforts to take on new markets and expand our international reach. This is an in-person position based out of our Stockholm office and reports directly to the Chief Product Officer.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
**UX Copywriting**
* Write clear, concise, and user-centric copy for in-app messages, onboarding flows, transactional notifications, and error messages.
* Ensure the voice and tone of our content aligns with MAJORITY’s brand guidelines and resonates with users.
* Collaborate with product designers and product managers to ensure the copy enhances the user experience and guides users through app interactions smoothly.
* Develop a style guide for in-app copy to maintain consistency across all touchpoints within the app.


**Localization and Translation Strategy**
* Define and execute Majority’s vision of AI-enabled localization to further roll out our services to new markets
* Oversee the end-to-end translation process of app content.
* Collaborate with translation vendors or in-house translators to ensure accuracy, cultural relevance, and compliance with regulatory requirements.
* Implement a quality assurance process to review translations before publishing to ensure consistency with brand voice and tone.
* Manage timelines and workflows for translation projects, ensuring timely delivery of Spanish content for product releases.
* Monitor user feedback to continuously improve the quality and effectiveness of translations.


**Qualifications**
* 3+ years of professional UX copywriting experience; Additional background in creative copywriting, editorial, or marketing is a plus. Bachelor’s degree strongly preferred.
* Native-level communication skills in English required
* Experience collaborating with product managers and product designers to build exceptional product experiences.
* Must possess excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to clearly and concisely articulate goals across various teams.
* Experience overseeing content translation or localization projects for specific regional markets; Spanish language fluency is a huge plus


**If you’re interested in joining our mission as a UX Copywriter, please apply by submitting your CV.**
 We believe in equal opportunity and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

title: Product Designer
description:
**Description**
*Position at LeoVegas Group*
**About The Role**
 We are looking for a UX Designer to join our Design team. The primary focus of this role is to ensure that our users enjoy a seamless, intuitive, and enjoyable gaming experience on our platform.
   

  

 You will work closely with your manager and other UX designers to support the rest of the organization and enhance our user interface designs.
   

  

 If you are passionate about creating user-centered designs, making data driven decisions, implementing innovative features, and leading improvements for intuitive, and user-friendly solutions, then this is the role for you!
   

  

 YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR:
   

  

* Be responsible for driving the discovery design process of our platform
* Ensure we focus on the right things to build a better user experience
* Focus on the native app for LeoVegas in multiple markets
* Improve and maintain the applications with a multi-market product focus
* Be the backbone of our user engagement strategy


 OUR SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATE WILL HAVE:
   

  

 Essential skills:
   

  

* A minimum of 3 years of experience as a UX designer driving projects
* Well versed in the discovery phase of the Triple Diamond design process
* Knowledge of quantitative and qualitative data sources and knows when to use them
* Ability to provide findings with viable solution recommendations in an easily digestible way
* Knowledge of UX best practices with a mobile-first and responsive design approach


 Nice to have skills:
   

  

* Graphic Design Experience
* Proven experience in creating wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows, and site maps
* Demonstrable experience with user interface design & ideation mapping tools like Figma, Sketch or AdobeXD
* Experience in working with software engineers
* Experienced with mobile apps


 WHO ARE WE?
   

  

 At the core of LeoVegas Group, is Team Leo. Our culture is our foundation and is what enables us to innovate, build, and lead as we trailblaze our way through the igaming industry. We’re a team of over 1800 innovators, initiators, and groundbreakers working in a fast-paced and agile environment across 16 offices world-wide.
   

  

**Benefits**
* Competitive basic salary
* Life-Occupational injuries & sickness insurance
* Possibility to enroll in an attractive private health care insurance for both you and your partner
* 5,000 SEK wellness contribution p/a
* 30 annual vacation days
* 1,500 SEK tech allowance
* Occupational Pension - Details on request
* Benify - A benefits portal with lots of attractive discounts
* Parental Pay
* Workation 4 weeks per year!
* Plenty of great company events
* Mobile phone & laptop of your choice
* If you are not based in the job location we will also provide you with a relocation package including flights and accommodation support
* Flexible hybrid working model


 JOIN US!
   

  

 In our pride, we like to empower our teammates to find their roar and run with their wildest ideas. We don’t wait around for things to happen, we pounce and make it happen!
   

  

 Do you think you would be a good fit for the Leo pride - give us a roar!
   

  

 \*\*As our company working language is English we’d like to see your CV in English please\*\*

title: Product Designer – Enterprise Products (Bangkok Based)
description:
****About Agoda****
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more . Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

**Our Purpose –** 
**Bridging the World Through Travel**
 We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.
   

  

 We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.
   

  

****About Agoda****
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 4,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

**The Domain of Enterprise Products**
 Behind the scenes of crafting compelling experiences for our millions of customers, we are diligently designing and optimizing hotel partner management products to cater to complex business scenarios on the B2B front. The enterprise products we develop at Agoda empower internal business users to control and update property information. Simultaneously, we enable over 600,000 properties worldwide to manage their content, pricing, allotments, customer segments, promotions, and market exposure effectively.
   

  

**Get to Know Our Team:**
 The Design team is a diverse group of product designers and researchers that help to build Agoda’s products from our home office in Bangkok. Being a product-driven company, we constantly partner with product managers and engineers to understand user problems and design workflows, interactions, and visual interfaces. There is always an opportunity for growth here. Focus on your craft to improve or expand your skill set, or step into a managerial role and flex your talents as a designer and driver of team projects. The opportunity and timing are now if you wish to come into a team that’s small enough to be scrappy and hands on, yet big enough to influence change and product strategy. Be a part of Agoda’s Design team and unlock the world for our global community of hotels and travelers.
   

  

**Experience Requirements & Role Expectations:**
* 5+ years of full-time experience as a UX/Interaction designer for digital or web-based products; in-house designer experience highly preferred
* Has experience of managing multiple stakeholders with agile development process
* Proficient in creating wireframes, UX design tools and prototyping
* A strong portfolio of work that demonstrates your design thinking, process, and solutions as it relates to web-based products or mobile applications that with complexities
* Good communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills in English
* Worked with enterprise products or B2B domain as a big plus


 The Enterprise Product Designer is an experienced problem solver for the areas with high complexity. He/she will work closely with Product stakeholders to collaborate and execute on the product team’s roadmap and milestones.
   

  

 The Enterprise Product Designer also possesses domain knowledge and expertise of the enterprise products or initiatives, to co-create future partner-centric product strategy or roadmap with your stakeholders. He/she will lead by creating alignment, telling compelling and persuasive stories to illustrate hotel partners’ problems connected with enterprise business journey, clearly articulate design decisions, driving and pushing for optimal UX solutions to stakeholders and influence the enterprise businessfor the longer term visions.
   

  

**Role Responsibility:**
* You will deliver hands-on design solutions for moderately complex enterprise business scenarios and well-defined business problems, aligning with property partners’ vision and our business goals
* You will actively engage in research and collaborate with our researcher to evaluate the impact of proposed solutions, driving improvements and refinements towards achieving desired outcomes in property partner-facing products
* You will acquire deep domain knowledge in both B2B and B2C aspects of the OTA (Online Travel Agency) business through daily collaboration with product leaders, analyzing research insights, and working closely with product stakeholders
* You will represent ‘Agoda Design’ by advocating user-centric design principles and engaging with external property partner touchpoints
* You will collaborate with product stakeholders to drive continuous discovery processes, validating and shaping ideas to experiment with and build upon, thereby influencing enterprise product strategy and roadmap


 #seattle #sanfrancisco #beijing #newyork #london #bangkok #singapore #chicago #hongkong #singapore #berlin #shanghai #losangeles #boston #austin #toronto #luxembourg #munich #oslo #copenhagen #stockholm #helsinki #brussels #hamburg #stuttgart #taipei #hamburg #stuttgart #dublin #telaviv #sydney #melbourne #perth #vancouver #montreal #prague #paris #dublin #telaviv #milan #rome #tokyo #osaka #amsterdam #moscow #saintpetersburg #frankfurt #shenzhen #istanbul #dubai #kiev #seoul
   

  

**Equal Opportunity Employer**
 At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics.
   

  

 We will keep your application on file so that we can consider you for future vacancies and you can always ask to have your details removed from the file. For more details please read our privacy policy .
   

  

 To all recruitment agencies: Agoda does not accept third party resumes. Please do not send resumes to our jobs alias, Agoda employees or any other organization location. Agoda is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.

title: iOS Engineer
description:
**Hej, Truecaller is calling you from Stockholm, Sweden! Ready to pick up?** 




  





 Our goal is to make communication smarter, safer, and more efficient, all while building trust everywhere. We're all about bringing you smart services with a big social impact, keeping you safe from fraud, harassment, scam calls, or messages, so you can focus on the conversations that matter.
 



  




* Top 20 most downloaded apps globally, and world’s #1 caller ID and spam-blocking service for Android and iOS, with extensive AI capabilities, with more than
 **400 million** 
 active users per month.
* Founded in 2009 with an impressive year-on-year growth
 
 with
 
 high profitability, listed on Nasdaq OMX Stockholm, Large Cap.
* Founded in 2009, listed on Nasdaq OMX Stockholm and is categorized as a Large Cap. Our focus on innovation, operational excellence, sustainable growth, and collaboration has resulted in consistently high profitability and strong EBITDA margins.
* A team of 400 people from ~35 different nationalities spread across our headquarters in Stockholm and offices in Bangalore, Mumbai, Gurgaon, and Tel Aviv
 **with high ambitions** 
 .



  





**We at the iOS team** 
 , are a bunch of the crazy ones, the misfits, the rebels, the troublemakers. We ideate and build all of the Truecaller iOS app. Our vision is to take our love for Apple products and build a great iOS app with beauty, care & affection.
 



  





**As an iOS Engineer,** 
 you will have an impact on how our users use the iOS app, you will be working on the whole app from the authentication to the search feature and you will also work very closely with all the other teams in the company to achieve our company vision: enabling each person or business to maintain a secure and trusted online identity.
 



  





**The impact you will create:** 




* Design, develop, and maintain the company's iOS application
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
* Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of the app
* Debug complex technical issues and identify solutions to improve the app
* Stay up-to-date with new technologies and trends in iOS development
* Write clean, maintainable, and scalable code
* Participate in code reviews and ensure adherence to coding standards
* Contribute to the technical design and architecture of the app
* Participate in the full software development life cycle, including planning, development, testing, and deployment.



  





**What you bring in:** 




* 3-5 years overall experience with iOS development
* Advanced knowledge of programming using Swift
* Deep understanding and several years of hands-on experience in Cocoa and iOS application development (architectures, design, tools, SDKs), asynchronous server communication, and UX optimization
* Experience in agile development
* Fluent English skills, oral and written



  





**It would be great if you also have:** 



* SwiftUI experience
* Swift async/await experience
* Familiarity with CI/CD tools like GitHub Actions and Fastlane



  





**Life at Truecaller -** 
 Behind the code:
 **https://www.instagram.com/lifeattruecaller/**




  





**Sounds like your dream job?** 




 We will fill the position as soon as we find the right candidate, so please send your application as soon as possible. As part of the recruitment process, we will conduct a background check.
 



  





**This position is based in Stockholm, Sweden.** 




  





 We only accept applications
 **in English** 
 .
 



  





**What we offer:** 



* **A smart, talented, and agile team:** 
 An international team where ~35 nationalities are working together in several locations and time zones with a learning, sharing, and fun environment.
* **A great compensation package** 
 : Competitive salary, 30 days of paid vacation, flexible working hours, private health insurance, parental leave top-up, pension contribution, Udemy membership to keep learning and improving, and free gym membership.
* **Great tech tools:** 
 Pick the computer and phone you most fancy within our budget ranges.
* **Office life:** 
 We strongly believe in the in-person collaboration and follow an office-first approach while offering some flexibility. Enjoy your days with great colleagues with loads of good stuff to learn from, and a wide range of yummy snacks and beverages. In addition, every now and then check out the playroom for a fun break or join our exciting parties and or team activities such as Lab days, Running team, movie nights in our cinema, or a Geek lunch. There is something for everyone!



  





**Come as you are:** 




 Truecaller is diverse, equal, and inclusive. We need a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, beliefs, and experiences to keep building our great products. No matter where you are based, which language you speak, your accent, race, religion, color, nationality, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, etc.
 **All those things make you who you are, and that’s why we would love to meet you.**

title: Senior Banknote Designer
description:
**Join Our Diverse Team At Crane Currency As a Senior Banknote Designer In Tumba Or Malta And Be a Part Of Our Journey Towards Innovation And Excellence.** 




  





**Who We Are** 




 Crane Currency is a premier industrial technology company and a pioneer in currency manufacturing and advanced micro-optics technology for securing physical products. Yes, chances are you have our product in your wallet right now! Our sophisticated equipment and software leverages proprietary core capabilities with detection and sensing technologies. Around the world, our customers trust us to anticipate their needs with innovative, reliable, and high-quality currency & authentication solutions and services—just as they have for generations.
 



  





**How You Will Make An Impact** 




 This role provides you an opportunity where millions of people one day may be holding your design work. Our customers look to you and the global design team to bring their currency and security design dreams into reality. You will utilize your skills, and develop new ones, to design our customer's currency or security products. You will design functional works of art that will forever be embedded into history.
 



  





**In your role as a Banknote Designer at Crane Currency you will:** 



* Design Banknotes Create secure, visually appealing designs for new and existing banknotes. Develop design proposals and presentations for business.
* Create and prototype security features, ensuring their functionality and quality throughout the design process.
* Incorporate Security Features: Integrate advanced anti-counterfeiting measures into Banknote Designs to prevent fraud.
* Conduct Research: Investigate cultural and historical elements to incorporate into banknote designs, ensuring they are meaningful and relevant.
* Stay Updated on Trends: Keep abreast of the latest trends in design and security to continuously improve banknote designs.
* Collaborate with Stakeholders: Work with government officials, security experts, and printing companies to ensure designs meet all requirements.
* Increase the quantity and efficiency of the design team output and ensure the quality, creativity and innovation of the team’s output are at the highest level.



  





**Knowledge and expertise that matter most for this role: Required:** 



* 3-5-year University level education and/or working experience within Arts & Crafts, Graphic design, Fine arts, Product Design or similar.
* Minimum 3-5 years of experience in designing banknotes, security features and printing methods.
* Minimum 3-5 years of demonstrated experience in security software (Corvina, The One) and Adobe such as Illustrator, Photoshop and InDesign.
* Experience in managing multiple work streams and meeting deadlines for customers and production through teamwork.
* Fluent in English, all other languages are a benefit.
* All candidates must submit a portfolio/personal website to be considered.



  





**Preferred** 



* Artistic graphic design talent with project management skills and a passion for learning and professional development.
* Experience as an effective communicator in design team collaborations, with strong interpersonal and graphic design skills.



  





**Malta - Benefits How we will care for you:** 




 We offer top-notch benefits including free health insurance, personal development opportunities, well-being and community engagement activities, competitive compensation, and a transport allowance. Discover more about our benefits here:
 **https://www.cranecurrency.com/careers/benefits/**




  





**Tumba-Benefits** 




**How We Will Care For You** 




 We offer top-notch medical benefits including a wellness allowance and reimbursement for medicines and medical care, opportunities for personal development, community engagement activities, competitive compensation, vacation, parental leave, and multiple tiers of retirement plans. Discover more about our benefits here:
 **https://www.cranecurrency.com/careers/benefits/**




  





**What Drives Our Team** 




 We are a passionate team of 1,200 creators and problem solvers, united by our purpose, we give people confidence every day in moments that matter. This comes to life through our Shared Values:
 


* People Matter
* Do the Right Thing
* Trusted Partner
* Innovate for Growth
* Always Improving



  





**Learn More About Our Values And Culture:** 
**https://www.cranecurrency.com/careers/life-at-crane-currency/**




  





 You can also check us out at:
 **https://www.glassdoor.com/Reviews/Crane-Currency-Reviews-E1187198.htm**




  





**Where We Are** 




*This role can be based in Tumba or Malta.* 




  





**Information about Malta, Ħal Far:** 
 Ħal Far is the largest industrial estate in Malta. It is at the southern extreme of Malta, between the localities of Birżebbuġa , Safi and Żurrieq . Check out what makes Malta a great place to live and work here:
 **https://www.cranecurrency.com/media/nlspcjdi/0133-er57-crane-currency-malta-ltd-relocation-guide-malta-june-2024\_.pdf**




  





**Information about Tumba, Stockholm** 
 : Located in the historic Tumba Bruk area, ten-minute walking distance from the train station, 30 km south of Stockholm, and about 20 minutes from Stockholm Central Station. Check out what makes Tumba a great place to live and work here:
 **https://www.cranecurrency.com/media/12rbruyv/0133-ex55-crane-currency-tumba-sweden-site-location-package-october-2024-lr.pdf**




  





 Crane Currency is a drug free workplace.
 



 Crane NXT is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, disability, national origin or any other characteristic protected under applicable local law.
