title: Technical Lead
description:
Aurobay develops and produces world-class hybrid engines and transmissions. With factories on two continents - Sweden and China - we're a pioneering global supplier of propulsion technology, development services and contract manufacturing. The Aurobay brand brings together over 9,000 dedicated and determined people that design, develop, and manufacture next-generation powertrain solutions for a global market.
  
Aurobay is part of HORSE Powertrain Limited, a global leader in powertrain solutions. The Group has 19,000 employees, 17 plants and 5 R&D centers across three continents. We partner with OEM customers around the world and offer innovative solutions that can cater to up to 80% of the growing hybrid and combustion powertrain market, enabling a faster transition toward cleaner mobility.
  
As a Technical Lead you will develop and manage our digital platforms to enhance our business efficiency, ensuring a seamless digital experience. You will work with a team dedicated to manage the ServiceNow platform and your home will be within our Digital organization.
  
Skills and Experience
  
  

At least five years of experience in ServiceNow development and architecture.
  
Deep understanding of cloud-based, event-driven architectures, with a focus on designing scalable and advanced solutions in ServiceNow.
  
Extensive experience in developing self-service and automation capabilities within the platform.
  
Expertise in ITSM, HRSD, SecOps, and App Engine best practices.
  
  

Your role at Aurobay
  
  

**As a Technical Lead at Aurobay you will:**  

Mentor and provide technical guidance to the team
  
Explore and implement improvements in CI/CD, automated testing, and versioning processes.
  
Leverage the ServiceNow platform to enhance data-driven decision-making across the organization.
  
Contribute to the strategic direction and evolution of our product roadmap
  
Engage in dynamic discussions with stakeholders
  
Collaborate on maintaining a well-organized product backlog
  
Develop, execute and maintain robust, sustainable platform solutions
  
Promote and contribute to our agile working culture
  
  

About the Team
  
The vast majority of the team is based in our Gothenburg office. This proximity allows us to meet regularly, fostering a strong sense of community and collaboration. Although a few members work remotely, our hybrid setup ensures that everyone is integrated and engaged. Our team is inherently curious and regularly organizes focused days where we come together to work jointly on common topics. These concentrated efforts always help us take significant leaps forward in our work. Additionally, we actively participate in Hackathons with our friends in the broader Digital organization, further enhancing our skills and fostering innovation.
  
What we offer
  
In addition to a competitive salary, a great location on Lindholmen or Skövde, and a genuine work-life balance, we provide the following benefits:
  
A yearly wellness contribution of SEK 5 000 for your physical and mental wellbeing.
  
A personal and professional development scheme to support your growth.
  
Additional pension funding.
  
Competitive additional and full coverage insurance.
  
  

Equal opportunities employer
  
We are an equal opportunities employer. We encourage candidates from underrepresented groups to apply, especially women, people from ethnic minority backgrounds, and people with disabilities. Research has shown that women and people from ethnic minority backgrounds are less likely to apply if they don't match 100% of the criteria. As a company, we value diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment. If you believe you have the skills and passion to excel in this role, we would love to hear from you. Let's explore the possibilities together.
  
How to apply
  
Deadline to submit your application is March 15 but the selection process will be running continuously. Please note that due to GDPR, we do not accept applications via email. We can’t wait to see what you can bring to our team!
  
Questions
  
If you have any additional questions regarding the position, you are welcome to contact recruiting manager Johan Ström, johan.strom@aurobay.com
  
For questions regarding the recruitment process please contact Recruiter Louise Mårdholm, louise.mardholm@aurobay.com
  
**Questions concerning trade union:** Unionen: Ordf Joakim Dahlin, joakim.dahlin@aurobay.com,

title: Integrationsspecialist SAP - Repona AB
description:
Integrationsspecialist SAP – Bli en del av Repona!
  
Är du en driven och lösningsorienterad specialist inom SAP-integration? Vill du arbeta i en dynamisk miljö där du får möjlighet att utveckla våra kunders framtida integrationslösningar? Då har vi jobbet för dig!
  
Om rollen
  
Som Integrationsspecialist SAP hos Repona kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i att designa, utveckla och optimera integrationslösningar för våra kunder. Du kommer arbeta i spetsen av SAP-teknologi, där innovation och kvalitet står i fokus. I rollen kommer du samarbeta med andra IT-specialister, SAP-konsulter och affärsanvändare och som konsult hos oss är du placerad på vårt kontor i Lund eller ute hos kund.
  
Dina främsta ansvarsområden
  
Designa och implementera integrationslösningar i SAP-miljöer
  
Arbeta med SAP Integration Suite, PI/PO och API-hantering
  
Samarbeta nära våra kunder för att förstå deras affärsbehov och optimera deras processer
  
Vara en del av ett erfaret och engagerat team som brinner för innovation och kvalitet
  
  

Vad vi söker
  
Vi letar efter en specialist inom SAP Integration Suite som har erfarenhet av att arbeta med integrationer i en hybrid- och molnbaserad miljö. För att lyckas i rollen bör du ha:
  
God kunskap om SAP-system, arkitektur och processer för att designa och implementera effektiva integrationsstrategier
  
Teknisk expertis inom SAP Cloud Integration (CPI), SAP Process Integration (PI) och SAP Process Orchestation (PO) och andra relevanta teknologier
  
Kunskap om API-hantering och erfarenhet av SAP API Management
  
  

Som person har du lätt för att kommunicera och kan förklara komplexa tekniska frågor för icke-tekniska teammedlemmar och intressenter. Vidare är du noggrann och har en förmåga att analysera och tolka komplexa data. Du behärskar svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.
  
Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av SAP Open Connectors för integration av tredjepartsapplikationer.
  
Varför Repona?
  
Vi är en ledande SAP-partner med expertis och hjärta!
  
Hos oss får du frihet att påverka, utvecklas och ta egna initiativ
  
Möjlighet att arbeta med spännande kunder och den senaste tekniken
  
En arbetsmiljö med högt engagemang, flexibelt arbete och en kultur som uppmuntrar initiativtagande samtidigt som vi värderar en sund balans mellan arbete och fritid
  
Attraktiva förmåner som konkurrenskraftig lön, tjänstepension, friskvårdsbidrag och andra förmåner som främjar din trivsel och utveckling
  
  

Låter det som något för dig? Ansök nu och bli en del av vårt team!
  
Ansök
  
I den här rekryteringen samarbetar vi med Gruffman Recruitment & Consulting. Din ansökan lämnar du via hemsidan Varmt välkommen! - Gruffman
  
Ansök snarast då vi arbetar med löpande urval.
  
Har du frågor, tveka inte att kontakta Ulrika Gruffman, ansvarig rekryteringskonsult, på ulrika@gruffman.nu eller 0733-434189.

title: SECURITY SPECIALIST PLATFORM AND CLOUD
description:
Cloud Platform Team at SAS empowers product teams to build cloud-native solutions while enhancing the developer experience and providing a robust platform for innovation. We support teams organized in value streams across multiple products. Cloud Platform Team is divided into sub-teams that focus on different areas such as Cloud, Kubernetes and Developer experience.
  
  

The Cloud Platform Team in SAS provides various capabilities to enable our product teams to build cloud-native solutions with greater developer experience and provide them with cloud platform to innovate. We support our product teams who are organized in value streams with several products. The Cloud Platform Team is segregated into several sub-teams which focus on different areas.
  
  

As a Security Engineer in the Cloud Platform Team, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and overseeing security strategies, policies, and procedures to protect against potential risks and vulnerabilities. You will work closely with product teams and fellow security experts to promote security best practices and ensure our standards are met.
  
In this role, you will lead the integration of security practices into the cloud infrastructure and throughout the software development lifecycle, aiming to minimize friction while strengthening the organization’s overall security posture.
  
  

**Challenges you will work on:**  

* Drive adoption of security practices like DDoS protection, CSPM, and Cloud Native Application Protection to secure cloud environments.
* Participate in disaster recovery planning and threat modeling to prepare for security incidents.
* Collaborate with Cloud Platform sub-teams to integrate security into cloud infrastructure services at every stage.
* Work with cross-functional teams to implement security best practices and adopt secure development practices, emphasizing “shifting security left.”
* Stay updated on cyber threats, trends, and technologies, offering recommendations to enhance security.
* Provide security guidance and training to Cloud Platform teams and stakeholders.
* Support compliance with regulatory requirements, audits, and information security policies.
* Foster a culture of security awareness across the organization.


**To be successful, we believe you have:**  

* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a similar field.
* 3+ years in IT security roles.
* Strong understanding of cybersecurity practices for protecting cloud infrastructure and applications.
* Hands-on experience with cloud security and application security best practices.
* Knowledge of cloud security frameworks (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) and practices.
* Knowledge of Kubernetes and Containerization security best practices, tools and standards.
* Familiar with GDPR, NIS2, and ISO 27001/2 regulatory standards.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
* Proactive problem solver with a data-driven mindset.
* Keen to expand knowledge and consistently enhance security practices.
* Team player with a positive attitude, passionate about cybersecurity.


Other of Importance
  
  

* Deadline for application: 28/03/2025. Please send us your CV as soon as possible, as interviews are conducted continuously and the position may be filled before the application deadline. Note that we are not able to handle any applications that are sent by email, due to GDPR.
* Desired startdate: As soon as possible.
* Position: Fulltime (100%) starting with a 6-month probation period.
* This position is based in Frösundavik, Solna (Stockholm), and you will be expected to work onsite. Remote work may also be an option, depending on the agreement made with your manager.
* To be eligible for this position you need a EU-work permit.

title: QA Engineer
description:
ABOUT THE ROLE
  
Are you an experienced software engineer looking for a meaningful role in a dynamic environment? Join our Markets Platform Team at LeoVegas Group, where you will play a crucial role in enhancing our global customer onboarding process and developing responsible gaming features. Your work will ensure a seamless, secure, and enjoyable experience for our customers across all our brands.
  
  

In this position, you will focus on refining the onboarding journey and promoting responsible gaming. Our mission is to create a safe gaming environment where players can set healthy limits on their gambling habits. We leverage data-driven insights and a robust CI/CD process, following the Kanban methodology to deliver high-quality solutions. You will work alongside expert back-end developers specialising in Java and Kotlin, as well as dedicated Quality Assurance Engineers.
  
  

**YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR:**  

* Developing a multi-brand gaming platform called Rhino, built on 230+ microservices.
* Driving continuous improvement in the player onboarding process and responsible gaming solutions through innovative solutions.
* Testing (unit tests) and updating documentation.
* Participating in architectural discussions and suggesting ideas for technical improvements.
* Collaborate with Product Managers and other stakeholders to deliver innovative solutions that enhance customer onboarding and promote responsible gaming.
* Working closely with Backend Engineers, QA Engineers and TA Engineers.


**OUR SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATE WILL HAVE THE FOLLOWING:**  

ESSENTIAL SKILLS
  
* Min. 2-4 years of experience in using Java + Spring Boot framework
* You have experience with MySQL
* You are familiar with microservice architectures


NICE TO HAVES
  
* Experience with Kotlin, Git, Kafka, Jenkins, Akka, Hazelcast, Elasticsearch, RabbitMQ, with Consul.
* Familiarity with Google Cloud Platform and BigQuery.
* Strong understanding of API testing methodologies and hands-on experience with tools like Postman.
* Knowledge of Automated Testing.


WHO WE ARE
  
  

At the core of LeoVegas Group is Team Leo. Our culture is our foundation and is what enables us to innovate, build, and lead as we trailblaze our way through the igaming industry. We’re a team of over 1400 innovators, initiators, and groundbreakers working in a fast-paced and agile environment across 11 offices worldwide.
  
  

BENEFITS
  
  

* Hybrid work policy
* 4 weeks of Workation (T&C apply)
* 30 annual vacation days
* Occupational Pension
* 5,000 SEK wellness contribution annually
* Parental Leave Top-Up
* Possibility to enroll in a private health care insurance for both you and your partner
* 1,500 SEK equipment allowance
* Benify - benefits portal with many offers and discounts
* We offer a relocation package with accommodation and flights.


JOIN US!
  
In our pride, we empower our teammates to find their roar and run with their wildest ideas. We don’t wait for things to happen; we pounce and make it happen!
  
  

Would you be a good fit for the Leo Pride - give us a roar!
  
  

\*\*As our company working language is English, we’d like to see your CV in English, please\*\*

title: AI Engineer
description:
### **JOB DESCRIPTION**



**About us**



At Sigma Industry Evolution, we strongly believe in a future driven by technology and innovation. We are dedicated towards developing cutting-edge technologies including, among others, mechatronics, embedded systems and artificial intelligence. We collaborate with some of the industry leaders in the world to solve challenges of the future.



**Job description**



We are seeking a highly motivated AI engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in machine learning, natural language processing, Large Language Models (LLM), Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) and AI agents.


### **BASIC QUALIFICATIONS**



**Responsibilities**



* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to optimize, integrate and deploy LLMs and other AI oriented solutions.
* Design, develop and deploy advanced and scalable generative AI pipelines, optimize search strategies and build custom algorithms.
* Analyze complex datasets and develop efficient data storage and cleaning strategies
* Conduct research and experiments with different stages of AI/ML pipelines to improve performance, user experience and cost efficiency


**Skills**



* MSc or PhD in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Engineering, Mathematics, Physics or equivalent.
* 3+ years proven experience in a previous role as a Data scientist, Machine Learning Engineer, Computer Vision Engineer or equivalent.
* Experience in developing (data collection, model creation and calibration) and deploying Machine Learning applications.
* Strong understanding of Large Language Models, generative AI, RAG and agentic AI.
* Strong understanding of semantic search and Natural Language Processing (NLP) concepts.
* Strong programming skills in Python.
* Experience working with PyTorch and/or Tensorflow/Keras.
* Experience with AI frameworks such as Langchain, Haystack, LlamaIndex etc
* Experience with embeddings and vector databases such as Weaviate, Pinecone, ChromaDB etc
* Familiarity with containerization (docker, Kubernetes)
* Familiarity with cloud integration and deployment with platforms like Azure, AWS or GCP. Skills in Azure is a plus.
* Familiarity with knowledge graphs.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently as well as part of a team.
* Strong communication skills and the ability to present complex technical concepts to a non-technical audience

### **MORE INFORMATION**



For more information please contact



Ivan Kertan,  

+46 761287807  

Ivan.Kertan@sigma.se



* #### **POSITION**


AI Engineer
* #### **COMPANY**


Sigma Industry Evolution
* #### **LOCATION**


Sweden
* #### **COMPETENCE AREA**


Software development
* #### **PUBLICATION DATE**


2025-02-27
* #### **EXPIRATION DATE**


2025-04-30
* #### **CONTACT**


Ivan Kertan, Ivan.Kertan@sigma.se, +46761287807

title: ERP Product Owner
description:
*At OX2, you work for a professional and ambitious company that is committed to accelerating access to renewable energy to speed up the transition to clean energy. We are multi-specialists to the core, offering a dynamic and inspiring workplace and enabling seamless, cross-functional collaboration to achieve optimal results.*

#### **IT Product Owner – IFS Cloud**


OX2’s IT organization is hiring an IT Product Owner to lead the development and continuous improvement of our ERP system, IFS Cloud. You’ll play a key role in OX2’s digital transformation, supporting project execution, procurement, and financial processes.


As part of the IT Business Solution Team, you will work close with other colleagues working with IFS Cloud Implementation. You will collaborate closely with process specialists, internal stakeholders, IT teams, and external IT partners. This position requires technical expertise, project management skills, and an understanding of business needs.


OX2 is in a high-growth phase, transitioning to a hybrid IPP business model, which means you’ll work in a fast-paced environment with constant opportunities to implement new features with an extra focus on Asset Management, Service Management and Supply Chain.

#### **Main responsibilities**


* Collaborate with stakeholders, process specialists, and IT teams to align IFS Cloud solutions with business goals.
* Drive initiatives that translate the business needs to technical solutions in IFS Cloud.
* Together with business process specialists, own the roadmap and backlog for IFS Cloud and related tools, ensuring clear deliverables for internal IT team and IT partners.
* Collaborate with other IT product owners to build cross-platform functionality as well as resolving cross-functional issues.
* Plan and oversee product releases, manage risks, and foster continuous improvements.
* Manage budgets for licenses and consultant services related to ERP system.
* Ensure systems comply with OX2’s IT security framework.
* Stay up to date with industry trends and advancements in IFS Cloud.
  
* 

#### **Your qualifications and experience**


We are looking for a candidate who has genuine interest and experience in leading the development of IFS Cloud Solutions. A prerequisite for the job is that you have broad technical competence and project management / leadership skills.

**Must have:**


* Relevant education in Computer Science, Information Technology, Business Engineering, or a related field
* Proven experience in roles such as Product Owner, Platform Lead, or System Maintenance Lead.
* Strong knowledge of IFS Cloud solutions (preferably any of the areas around Asset Management, Supply Chain and service management)
* Experience working in Agile/Hybrid development environments and familiar with IT management tools, such as JIRA
* Analytical mindset and problem-solving abilities
* Excellent communication skills in both Swedish and English.


We attach great importance to personal qualities and are looking for you who have high ability to take initiatives, high driving capability and sense of responsibility for your own work. We believe you are service-minded, structured, and proactive with the ability to balance details and the bigger picture. You thrive in a collaborative, fast-paced environment and enjoy working across diverse teams.

**Experience within the following areas is valuable but not required:**


* IT security frameworks.
* Large ERP implementations or digital transformation projects.
* Knowledge of IFS Cloud Financial processes
* Knowledge in OneStream budget and consolidation processes

#### **Our Offer To You**


* An exciting IT career in renewables, taking part in "powering the great shift."
* A knowledgeable team of experts and an energetic, fun workplace located at the center of Stockholm.
* A great compensation and benefits package including for example: 5000 SEK per year in wellness allowance, 30 days paid vacation and a competitive pension plan.

#### **The Recruitment Process**


Last time to apply is 2025-03-28 but applications will be reviewed continuously, and we are ready to move quickly with the right candidate - so do not hesitate to send in your application as soon as possible.


If you have questions about the position, feel free to reach out to hiring manager Jennie Blomqvist at 0737162015 or jennie.blomqvist@ox2.com.

#### **About OX2**


OX2 is a fully integrated provider of renewable energy solutions at scale. We are an international multi-technology company bringing together the brightest minds and most ambitious team players to address the defining challenge of our time: the shift from fossil fuels to clean energy, the greater shift to a sustainable society and economy. We accelerate the access to renewable energy. The company has around 500 employees and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.


For more information visit: www.ox2.com

title: Azure Arkitekt
description:
Brinner du för att lösa problem och skapa smarta, hållbara molnlösningar? Vill du vara en del av ett gäng som värdesätter både innovation och arbetsglädje? Då kan vi vara din nästa arbetsplats!

**Om rollen:**


Som **Azure Cloud Arkitekt** hos oss får du en **nyckelroll** i att hjälpa våra kunder ta nästa steg i sin molnresa. Tillsammans med våra konsulter och utvecklare bygger du **hållbara och skalbara molnlösningar** – alltid med fokus på innovation, säkerhet och effektivitet.


**Lyssna och förstå** – Du jobbar nära kunderna för att förstå deras behov och översätta dem till smarta lösningar.  

️ **Skapa och implementera** – Designa arkitekturer, bygga skalbara miljöer och optimera befintliga system.  

**Analysera och förbättra** – Se till att prestanda, säkerhet och kostnadseffektivitet alltid är på topp.  

**Samarbeta och dela kunskap** – Vi tror på att växa tillsammans! Du blir en del av ett team där vi inspirerar och stöttar varandra.  

**Sätta strategier** – Hjälpa kunder att förstå molnets möjligheter och bygga en långsiktig roadmap.


Hos oss får du **kombinera teknisk expertis med kreativ problemlösning** – och samtidigt ha riktigt kul på jobbet!

**Är det här du?**


️ Du har minst fyra års erfarenhet som konsult inom molnteknik.  

️ Du har jobbat med infrastruktur, inom Azure.  

️ Du gillar att hitta smarta IT-lösningar och har ett öga för helheten.  

️ Du pratar och skriver flytande svenska, då det krävs i det dagliga arbetet.

**Vad vi erbjuder**


**Flexibilitet** – vi tror på balans mellan jobb och fritid. **Kompetensutveckling** – utbildningar, certifieringar och en massa mer. **Härlig företagskultur** – AW:s, konferensresor och roliga aktiviteter.  

**Inkluderande arbetsmiljö** – hos oss är alla välkomna och vi lyfter varandra!

**Vem är vi?**


Vi är **B3 Cloud**, ett härligt gäng på cirka 40 molnexperter i Stockholm och Göteborg. Vi är stolta över att vara en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser och vi brinner för att skapa innovativa lösningar tillsammans!


**Om B3 Consulting Group**

*B3 Consulting Group är ett expansivt konsultbolag med cirka 1000 medarbetare. Vi brinner för innovation och hjälper Sveriges ledande företag och organisationer att skapa framtidens möjligheter genom digital transformation. B3 finns på* tolv orter i Sverige samt i Polen, med huvudkontor i Stockholm. Bolaget grundades 2003, är noterat på Nasdaq Stockholm Small Cap och omsatte 1 141 MSEK 2023.


*Vi är stolta över vår prisbelönta företagskultur, där olikheter, erfarenheter och gemensam energi värdesätts. Som ett etiskt och transparent bolag strävar vi efter att ha en positiv påverkan på samhället, människor och miljön. Vi är även engagerade i Women in Tech och initiativ för att stärka AI-utbildning för kvinnor. 2024 utsågs vi till Årets Employer Branding-företag, och vår HR-chef vann titeln Årets HR-chef.*  

  

**Låter det spännande?** Hör av dig! Vi ser fram emot att lära känna dig!

title: Azure Tekniker
description:
Som **Azure Tekniker** hos oss blir du en **central del av vårt team** och får chansen att arbeta med några av marknadens mest spännande molnprojekt. Vi letar efter dig som **brinner för teknik**, gillar att lösa problem och vill vara med och bygga framtidens IT-lösningar!


**Bygga och drifta molnlösningar** – Du ser till att våra kunders Azure-miljöer är stabila, säkra och optimerade.  

**Migrera och modernisera** – Du hjälper till att flytta verksamheter från traditionella IT-miljöer till moderna molnplattformar.  

**Felsöka och förbättra** – Du identifierar flaskhalsar, säkerhetsrisker och optimeringsmöjligheter.  

**Stödja och samarbeta** – Du arbetar tätt ihop med arkitekter, utvecklare och kunder för att skapa de bästa lösningarna.  

**Lära och utvecklas** – Tekniken förändras snabbt, och vi ser till att du alltid ligger steget före genom kompetensutveckling och utbildningar.


Här får du en **praktisk och varierad roll** där du både får jobba hands-on och utvecklas strategiskt – med stöd av ett erfaret och härligt team!


**Vi söker dig som**  

  



* Har erfarenhet av att arbeta som konsult inom IT-infrastruktur, med fokus på Azure.
* Besitter teknisk kompetens inom Microsofts infrastruktur- och plattformstjänster i Azure.
* Är van vid att arbeta med molnlösningar och har en proaktiv inställning till problemlösning.
* Kommunicerar obehindrat på engelska, både i tal och skrift.

**Vad vi erbjuder**


* **Konkurrenskraftig lön** som speglar din erfarenhet och kompetens.
* **Flexibla arbetsförhållanden** för att underlätta balansen mellan arbete och privatliv.
* **Stora möjligheter till personlig och professionell utveckling** genom interna utbildningar och vår egen Cloud Skola.
* **En inkluderande och stödjande arbetsmiljö** där dina idéer och ditt engagemang värdesätts.
* **Sociala aktiviteter och gemensamma evenemang**, från årliga konferensresor till regelbundna After Works och andra roliga aktiviteter.

**Om B3 Consulting Group**

*B3 Consulting Group är ett expansivt konsultbolag med cirka 1000 medarbetare. Vi brinner för innovation och hjälper Sveriges ledande företag och organisationer att skapa framtidens möjligheter genom digital transformation. B3 finns på* tolv orter i Sverige samt i Polen, med huvudkontor i Stockholm. Bolaget grundades 2003, är noterat på Nasdaq Stockholm Small Cap och omsatte 1 141 MSEK 2023.


*Vi är stolta över vår prisbelönta företagskultur, där olikheter, erfarenheter och gemensam energi värdesätts. Som ett etiskt och transparent bolag strävar vi efter att ha en positiv påverkan på samhället, människor och miljön. Vi är även engagerade i Women in Tech och initiativ för att stärka AI-utbildning för kvinnor. 2024 utsågs vi till Årets Employer Branding-företag, och vår HR-chef vann titeln Årets HR-chef.*  

  

**Låter det spännande?** Hör av dig! Vi ser fram emot att lära känna dig!

️ Du pratar och skriver flytande svenska, då det krävs i det dagliga arbetet.

**Vad vi erbjuder**


**Flexibilitet** – vi tror på balans mellan jobb och fritid. **Kompetensutveckling** – utbildningar, certifieringar och en massa mer. **Härlig företagskultur** – AW:s, konferensresor och roliga aktiviteter.  

**Inkluderande arbetsmiljö** – hos oss är alla välkomna och vi lyfter varandra!

**Vem är vi?**


Vi är **B3 Cloud**, ett härligt gäng på cirka 40 molnexperter i Stockholm och Göteborg. Vi är stolta över att vara en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser och vi brinner för att skapa innovativa lösningar tillsammans!


**Om B3 Consulting Group**

*B3 Consulting Group är ett expansivt konsultbolag med cirka 1000 medarbetare. Vi brinner för innovation och hjälper Sveriges ledande företag och organisationer att skapa framtidens möjligheter genom digital transformation. B3 finns på* tolv orter i Sverige samt i Polen, med huvudkontor i Stockholm. Bolaget grundades 2003, är noterat på Nasdaq Stockholm Small Cap och omsatte 1 141 MSEK 2023.


*Vi är stolta över vår prisbelönta företagskultur, där olikheter, erfarenheter och gemensam energi värdesätts. Som ett etiskt och transparent bolag strävar vi efter att ha en positiv påverkan på samhället, människor och miljön. Vi är även engagerade i Women in Tech och initiativ för att stärka AI-utbildning för kvinnor. 2024 utsågs vi till Årets Employer Branding-företag, och vår HR-chef vann titeln Årets HR-chef.*

title: Säkerhetskonsult inom Microsoft

Den här rollen är perfekt för dig som vill **kombinera teknisk expertis med strategiskt tänkande** och samtidigt göra verklig skillnad för företag och organisationer!

title: Windows server
description:
Är du en duktig på Windows Server och brinner för att optimera IT-miljöer? Vill du vara en del av ett team som värdesätter gemenskap, enkelhet och entreprenörskap? Då kan B3 Cloud vara din nästa arbetsplats!

 **Om rollen – Din möjlighet att göra skillnad i spännande projekt!**


Som **Windows Server-konsult** hos oss kommer du att:

* **Delta aktivt i olika projekt** där du förbättrar, utvecklar och underhåller våra kunders IT-infrastruktur.
* **Vägleda kunder i teknikval** och implementera ny teknik för att möta deras behov.
* **Arbeta med design och implementering** av större servermiljöer.
* **Använda dina kunskaper inom scripting, Active Directory, VMware och Backup** för att optimera system.
* **Bidra med din förståelse för säkerhetsaspekter** och hålla dig uppdaterad inom området.

**Vi söker dig som…**

* Har **minst 5 års erfarenhet** att arbeta med Windows Server som konsult.
* Är skicklig på att designa och implementera omfattande servermiljöer.
* Har erfarenhet av **scripting, Active Directory, VMware och Backup**.
* Är lösningsorienterad och tar initiativ för att förbättra och utveckla processer.
* Värdesätter en arbetsmiljö präglad av gemenskap, enkelhet och entreprenörskap.


Extra meriterande är om du har kunskaper inom **System Centers ekosystem**, inklusive SCOM, SCSM, Intune och Orchestrator, och förstår hur dessa samverkar ur ett service management-perspektiv.

**Vad vi erbjuder**

* **En inkluderande och energifylld företagskultur** där vi värdesätter olikheter och erfarenheter.
* **Möjligheter till kompetensutveckling** och att hålla dig i framkant inom ditt expertisområde.
* **Flexibilitet och frihet** att påverka dina uppdrag, arbetstider och utveckling.

title: Client Chief Architect
description:
**Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.**

**YOUR ROLE**  

**In order to drive the growth agenda in Nordics Cloud Infrastructure Services, you will be responsible for becoming a trusted technical partner to your client, plus supporting pre-sales and leading the delivery of a range of projects, from an architectural perspective in accordance with the roadmap you have developed in conjunction with your client. You are expected to deliver revenue generating projects or project portfolios and identify/achieve additional sales working across the Nordics in different sectors.**

**You will:**

* **Define the architecture and ensure a comprehensive and coherent view across business, information, systems and technology**
* **Work with clients to build a sound strategy, processes, information and/or information technology assets for the client’s organisation**
* **Assist in and support the creation of enterprise and/or delivery solutions for a project or a significant part of a project**
* **Generate innovative solutions and introduce new tools and technology to support the business, in line with the strategic roadmap that you will create with the clients own Chief Architect or Chief Technology Officer**

**Part of the role will be to guide problem determination in the event of an issue on any Nordic account requiring more senior resources to facilitate recovery, this will include being able to assess the technical state of an account and make recommendations on improvements required to bring the account up to required standards and where required lead the implementation of those recommendations.**  

  

**YOUR PROFILE**  

**We believe that you bring:**

* **Strong experience with enterprise IT architecture and a broad range of related technologies**
* **Proven track record of leading a range of projects and contributing to annual sales quota in bookings within your client**
* **Ability to manage internal, client and third party teams**
* **Ability to communicate with business and IT specialists, at various levels**
* **Industry recognized enterprise architecture trainings and/or certifications**
* **Flexibility about work content and location/work arrangements**
* **Financial analysis/ Project Financial Acumen**
* **Continuous service improvement**
* **Risk Management through your knowledge of business**
* **Full working proficiency in English and preferable also in Swedish**

**WHAT WE BELIEVE YOU WILL ENJOY ABOUT WORKING HERE**  

**We recognize the significance of flexible work arrangements to provide support. Be it remote work, or flexible work hours, you will get an environment to maintain healthy work life balance. At the heart of our mission is your career growth. Our array of career growth programs and diverse professions are crafted to support you in exploring a world of opportunities. Equip yourself with valuable certifications in the latest technologies such as AWS and Microsoft Azure.**  

**#LI-JF1**

**Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fuelled by its market leading capabilities in AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2023 global revenues of €22.5 billion.**
company_description: Capgemini is a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology.

title: Azure Tekniker
description:
Som **Azure Tekniker** hos oss blir du en **central del av vårt team** och får chansen att arbeta med några av marknadens mest spännande molnprojekt. Vi letar efter dig som **brinner för teknik**, gillar att lösa problem och vill vara med och bygga framtidens IT-lösningar!


* **Bygga och drifta molnlösningar** – Du ser till att våra kunders Azure-miljöer är stabila, säkra och optimerade.
* **Migrera och modernisera** – Du hjälper till att flytta verksamheter från traditionella IT-miljöer till moderna molnplattformar.
* **Felsöka och förbättra** – Du identifierar flaskhalsar, säkerhetsrisker och optimeringsmöjligheter.
* **Stödja och samarbeta** – Du arbetar tätt ihop med arkitekter, utvecklare och kunder för att skapa de bästa lösningarna.
* **Lära och utvecklas** – Tekniken förändras snabbt, och vi ser till att du alltid ligger steget före genom kompetensutveckling och utbildningar.


Här får du en **praktisk och varierad roll** där du både får jobba hands-on och utvecklas strategiskt – med stöd av ett erfaret och härligt team!


**Vi söker dig som**  

  



* Har erfarenhet av att arbeta som konsult inom IT-infrastruktur, med fokus på Azure.
* Besitter teknisk kompetens inom Microsofts infrastruktur- och plattformstjänster i Azure.
* Är van vid att arbeta med molnlösningar och har en proaktiv inställning till problemlösning.
* Kommunicerar obehindrat på engelska, både i tal och skrift.

**Vad vi erbjuder**


* **Konkurrenskraftig lön** som speglar din erfarenhet och kompetens.
* **Flexibla arbetsförhållanden** för att underlätta balansen mellan arbete och privatliv.
* **Stora möjligheter till personlig och professionell utveckling** genom interna utbildningar och vår egen Cloud Skola.
* **En inkluderande och stödjande arbetsmiljö** där dina idéer och ditt engagemang värdesätts.
* **Sociala aktiviteter och gemensamma evenemang**, från årliga konferensresor till regelbundna After Works och andra roliga aktiviteter.

**Om B3 Consulting Group**

*B3 Consulting Group är ett expansivt konsultbolag med cirka 1000 medarbetare. Vi brinner för innovation och hjälper Sveriges ledande företag och organisationer att skapa framtidens möjligheter genom digital transformation. B3 finns på* tolv orter i Sverige samt i Polen, med huvudkontor i Stockholm. Bolaget grundades 2003, är noterat på Nasdaq Stockholm Small Cap och omsatte 1 141 MSEK 2023.

title: Software Solutions Sales Exec - Nordics
description:
**Remote Work: Hybrid**

 **Overview:**
At Zebra, we are a community of innovators who come together to create new ways of working to make everyday life better. United by curiosity and care, we develop dynamic solutions that anticipate our customer’s and partner’s needs and solve their challenges.  


Being a part of Zebra Nation means being seen, heard, valued, and respected. Drawing from our diverse perspectives, we collaborate to deliver on our purpose. Here you are a part of a team pushing boundaries to redefine the work of tomorrow for organizations, their employees, and those they serve.  


You have opportunities to learn and lead at a forward-thinking company, defining your path to a fulfilling career while channeling your skills toward causes that you care about – locally and globally. We’ve only begun reimaging the future – for our people, our customers, and the world.  

Let’s create tomorrow together. **This Solutions Sales role is part of the Software Solutions Sales Team. This team is the focal point for driving our Strategic Solutions into our key customers mainly in Retail vertical.**


This role is responsible for achieving sales success and market penetration to deliver growth. Selling directly to end-users and via channels, this position will focus on new business sales within their assigned accounts in Nordics territory.

 **Responsibilities:**  

* Responsible for developing and maintaining a healthy pipeline of new business opportunities to meet annual targets and defined objectives
* Leading all aspects of the sales cycle in your target accounts. This includes solution development, deal term negotiation, and contract closing process
* Being an expert in all things ZPA (Zebra Prescriptive Analytics) and Reflexis Solutions for your Accounts/Region/Territory
* Collaborating with internal teams to deliver 100% customer satisfaction, improving opportunities for additional business growth
* Meet and exceed individual quotas for contracts and revenue by closing multi-year cloud contracts
* Experience should include closing large, enterprise-wide annual recurring revenue contracts (ARR)
* Understanding Zebra’s unique value propositions and how our solutions have delivered value for our customers
* Identifying, reaching and influencing key decision makers and all influencers and stakeholders within targeted retail prospects
* Building a consistently producing territory by taking targeted retailers from suspect to prospect to opportunity to customer to long-term year-over-year client
* Being in the field in front of prospects on a weekly basis
* Diligently seeking to align retailer priorities with Zebra solution outcomes and move projects to closure in a timely manner via a strong value selling orientation
* Holding prospects accountable to their part in moving forward to realize the created vision
* Work in a collaborative team-based selling model with other Zebra sales reps, Business Development Reps, Solution Consultants, Value Engineers, Executives, Partners, Marketing and Customer Success
* Maintain current knowledge of the company’s solutions, industry compelling events, and competitive differentiators while making every interaction with a retailer world class
* Be a challenger – understand target client issues, needs and goals, and proactively educate and bring solutions to each discussion to deliver outcomes they desire

 **Qualifications:**  

* 8+ years Software Sales experience, B2B SaaS solutions sales
* Experienced in selling large ticket enterprise software product into Tier-1 customers
* Proficient knowledge of Swedish and Danish language
* Desire to seek new business -penetrate non-customer accounts and to create a need where it may not exist
* Ability to act as partner to C-level executives and in the field. Ability to develop relationships and closing opportunities with leading brands
* Able to evidence a consistent track record of selling high value multi-year recurring SaaS transactions, demonstrating a tenacious and curious personality to get to the root of customer expectation and needs.
* Comfortable and skilled in virtual selling (as clients require in these times)
* Success selling high dollar multi-year deals with 6-12 months sales cycles
* Technical aptitude and strong desire to understand how our software empowers retailers
* Ability to solve complex problems which may require engagement across diverse client stakeholder needs at the C-level
* Ability to work in team - building business case for change, determines and assembles the appropriate team to close deals
* Willing and able to cover a large territory, travel weekly, and sell in person, not phone and email only
* Travel Requirements (as a % of time): 50-75% travel

**Benefits:**

* 30 days of vacation
* Up to 32 hours paid time off per year to volunteer with a charity of your choice
* Reward & Recognition scheme - earn points to spend online
* Training and personal development in soft skills and hard skills, access to our internal learning portal and internal career opportunities within Zebra departments
* Yearly salary increases according to individual performance
* Employee referral bonus for bringing New Talent to Zebra
* Wellness Allowance
* Healthcare insurance
* Pension Plan and Life Insurance
* Access to an innovative online learning platform
* Employee Assistance Program

  

To protect candidates from falling victim to online fraudulent activity involving fake job postings and employment offers, please be aware our recruiters will always connect with you via @zebra.com email accounts. Applications are only accepted through our applicant tracking system and only accept personal identifying information through that system. Our Talent Acquisition team will not ask for you to provide personal identifying information via e-mail or outside of the system. If you are a victim of identity theft contact your local police department.
company_description: A global leader respected for innovation and reliability, Zebra offers technologies that give a virtual voice to an organization's assets.

title: Information Security (GRC) Specialist
description:
Are you passionate about security, risk, and compliance? Do you want to play an active role in securing financial technology by ensuring compliance with industry standards? Quartr is now looking for a hands-on Infosec (GRC) specialist to help us build a strong security foundation for compliance to ensure that we achieve and maintain the crucial certification SOC2.

#### **About the team**


This is a new cross-function role in Quartr involving close collaboration with both technical and non-technical teams in Stockholm.

##### **What you'll do**


As an Infosec specialist (GRC), you’ll play a key role in developing and optimizing Quartr security and compliance strategies. You’ll collaborate closely with engineering, product, and leadership teams to establish policies, conduct risk assessments, and ensure adherence to security best practices.

##### **What will help you succeed**

* 3-5 years of experience in security compliance framework SOC 2
* Experience in working hands-on with governance, risk, and compliance roles within a SaaS or fintech environment.
* Strong knowledge in cloud security (preferably AWS) and security frameworks (ISO 27001, NIST, CIS, etc.).
* Experience working with security tools like SIEM, vulnerability management, and risk assessment platforms.
* Ability to work independently and drive security initiatives in a fast-paced start-up or scale-up environment.
* Excellent communication skills to collaborate across technical and non-technical teams.
* Security certifications (e.g., CISSP, CISM, CISA) are a plus but not required
* It's a plus with experience from security incident response and security awareness training, and DevSecOps principles
* 

***Note:****This role is* ***based in Sweden*** *with a valid work permit. We are also not looking for consultants or help from recruitment agencies.*

#### **Why join Quartr?**

**Do your life's work**



We focus passionately on doing things with very high quality across our entire organization  

* 

**Join the foundational team**

* We are still in the very early innings of what we believe to be a multi-decade journey.

  

**Remote-first culture**

* Work from where you are most productive. Fully remote, from one of our two offices in central Gothenburg or Stockholm, or a combination of both.

  

**Skin in the game**


We truly believe in the power of incentives and in sharing the company's success with the team, so every employee is offered qualified stock options.  

* 

**Competitive salary & options**

* To deliver at the highest level, we of course need the best people. This is reflected in our compensation.

  

**Wellness allowance**

* We want to encourage health and exercise through a generous wellness allowance.

#### **About Quartr**

Quartr is a software company serving the world of finance. The Quartr ecosystem gives millions of investors and corporate professionals worldwide easy access to first-party information from public companies through various services – including a web app, a mobile app, and an API solution. Recognized as one of Fast Company's Most Innovative Companies for 2024, Quartr is also backed by top investors.

**Learn more about Quartr**

**Quartr x Perplexity** our partnership with Perplexity

**Quartr secures Investment from Altos Ventures** partnering with respected San Fransisco-based VC firm to further accelerate growth and continue transforming qualitative market research
